1370: Gherbaren moved to Nieu straet.B.5 after marriage.
Got married to Reymodis at age 22 in 1370.
1371: Had a daughter with Reymodis, Sybillia, at age 23.
1372: Had a son with Reymodis, Alem, at age 24.
1373: Had a son with Reymodis, Kornillis, at age 25.
1377: Had a daughter with Reymodis, Scilla, at age 29.
1378: Had a son with Reymodis, Pelegrim, at age 30.
1380: Had a son with Reymodis, Alebrando, at age 32.
1382: Had a son with Reymodis, Franse, at age 34.
1391: Had a daughter with Reymodis, Riet, at age 43.
1395: Had a daughter with Reymodis, Godeweris, at age 47.
